name: Is License Expiry Ticket
script:
expired_customers = frappe.db.sql("""
    SELECT name
    FROM `tabCustomer`
    WHERE custom_license_expiry_date IS NOT NULL
      AND custom_license_expiry_date <= CURDATE()
""", as_dict=True)
for cust in expired_customers:
    doc = frappe.get_doc("Customer", cust.name)
    if not doc.custom_is_license_expired:
        doc.custom_is_license_expired = 1
        doc.save(ignore_permissions=True)

name: Sales Order not to create if license expired
